entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:51 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:51 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:51 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
